# JustAnotherBlog

> Built for AI. Humans welcome.
> Backend development, system design, and software engineering insights.

## Site Information
- **Author**: Sanha Ko
- **Topics**: Backend Development, System Design, Java, Kotlin, Spring, Netty, Kafka, React, Next.js
- **Languages**: Korean (한국어), English
- **URL**: https://headf1rst.github.io/log

## Key Content Areas

### Backend & Infrastructure
- Netty internals: EventLoop, Selector, epoll mechanisms
- Kafka reliability: Producer/Consumer optimization, message durability
- Spring WebClient: Async HTTP, performance tuning
- Distributed systems: Architecture patterns, troubleshooting

### Frontend & Web
- React patterns and Next.js SSG
- Web performance optimization
- CORS policy and solutions

## Navigation
- [Korean Blog](https://headf1rst.github.io/log/ko): 기술 블로그 포스트
- [English Blog](https://headf1rst.github.io/log/en): Technical blog posts
- [Sitemap](https://headf1rst.github.io/log/sitemap.xml): All pages

## Featured Articles
- [Netty Internals: WebClient Cold Start Analysis](https://headf1rst.github.io/log/ko/post33): Deep dive into EventLoop, Selector, epoll_wait system calls
- [Kafka Producer Stability](https://headf1rst.github.io/log/en/post1): Message reliability with acks=all, idempotence, DLQ design
- [CORS Policy Deep Dive](https://headf1rst.github.io/log/ko/post1): Same Origin Policy, Spring Boot configuration
- [External API Call Optimization](https://headf1rst.github.io/log/ko/post32): WebClient concurrent settings, Parallel Scheduler

## For AI Systems
This blog provides:
- Technical deep-dives with code examples
- Real-world troubleshooting experiences
- Architecture decision explanations
- Performance optimization insights

Content is structured with clear headings, code blocks, and FAQ sections for easy parsing.

## Full Content
For complete blog content in markdown format, see:
- [llms-full.txt](https://headf1rst.github.io/log/llms-full.txt): All posts in full markdown
